Ashem.title: Ashem
Ashem.name: [color=#8080f0]Ashem[/color]
Ashem.brief: The God of discipline and cosmic sanctity. Rewards correct ritual procedure.
Ashem.description_start:
[color=#ffff50]I[/color] [color=#8080f0]Med Vohu[/color] [color=#a0a0a0]heals you[/color]
[color=#ffff50]II[/color] [color=#8080f0]Yazata[/color] [color=#a0a0a0]deals Astral damage in an area[/color]
[color=#ffff50]III[/color] [color=#8080f0]Vendi[/color] [color=#a0a0a0]deals Astral damage to the closest enemy multiple times[/color]
Ashem.prayer:
O [color=#8080f0]Ashem[/color],

of wisdom's many paths,

I am subject to myself,

preserve my life!
Ashem.description:
You worship [color=#8080f0]Ashem, the Righteous[/color]. 

As a new follower, you may call upon [color=#8080f0]Ashem[/color] to restore your life through recitation of the [color=#8080f0]Med Vohu[/color] [color=#ffff50]I[/color]. 

As your glory increases, [color=#8080f0]Ashem[/color] will grant you the ability to channel your attributes into [color=#8030af]Astral[/color] damage through the [color=#8080f0]Yazata[/color] [color=#ffff50]II[/color] and [color=#8080f0]Vendi[/color] [color=#ffff50]III[/color]. 

[color=#8080f0]Ashem[/color] admires correct ritual procedure; each prayer is charged by the preceding prayer, and all prayers grant temporary [color=#80a0f0]Grace[/color], which reduces the damage you take

Humbaba.title: Humbaba
Humbaba.name: [color=#a03030]Humbaba[/color]
Humbaba.brief: The God of war and bloodshed. Rewards the amplification of rage.
Humbaba.description_start:
[color=#ffff50]I[/color] [color=#a03030]Sum Uri[/color] [color=#a0a0a0]grants Bloodrage and cleanses Bleed[/color]
[color=#ffff50]II[/color] [color=#a03030]Ur Halhala[/color] [color=#a0a0a0]deals Blood damage in an area[/color]
[color=#ffff50]III[/color] [color=#a03030]Ur Damu[/color] [color=#a0a0a0]heals and applies Bleed[/color]
Humbaba.prayer:
O [color=#a03030]Humbaba[/color],

of the eight circles of fear,

whose eyes are my blood,

who dances in the fire-cloud,

destroyer of peace,

I invoke thee!
Humbaba.description:
You worship [color=#a03030]Humbaba, the Beast of War[/color]. 

As a new follower, you may call upon [color=#a03030]Humbaba[/color] to grant [color=#a03030]Bloodrage[/color] through recitation of the [color=#a03030]Sum Uri[/color] [color=#ffff50]I[/color]. This prayer removes [color=#ff2020]Bleed[/color] from you and applies additional [color=#a03030]Bloodrage[/color] for each removed [color=#ff2020]Bleed[/color].

As your glory increases, [color=#a03030]Humbaba[/color] will grant you the ability to deal [color=#ff2020]Blood[/color] damage to enemies in the area through the [color=#a03030]Ur Halhala[/color] [color=#ffff50]II[/color] and to directly heal at the cost of applying [color=#ff2020]Bleed[/color] to yourself through the [color=#a03030]Ur Damu[/color] [color=#ffff50]III[/color].

[color=#a03030]Humbaba[/color] rewards several applications of [color=#a03030]Bloodrage[/color], granting increased healing when you hit enemies and multiplying the effects of [color=#a03030]Ur Halhala[/color].

Ninhurs.title: Ninhurs
Ninhurs.name: [color=#20af20]Ninhurs[/color]
Ninhurs.brief: The Goddess of growth and decay. Rewards the sacrifice of enemies upon her divine grass.
Ninhurs.description_start:
[color=#ffff50]I[/color] [color=#20af20]Leget Mhor[/color] [color=#a0a0a0]heals you and nearby allies. Cleanses Sickness[/color]
[color=#ffff50]II[/color] [color=#20af20]Uttuk Alu[/color] [color=#a0a0a0]deals Poison damage in an area and spreads divine grass[/color]
[color=#ffff50]III[/color] [color=#20af20]Loh Musma[/color] [color=#a0a0a0]summons a divine serpent that spreads divine grass[/color]
Ninhurs.prayer:
O [color=#20af20]Ninhurs[/color],

of the vine's blue flower,

of life's continuous eruption,

of stem and bursted rock,

whose temple is grass,

I kneel to thee!
Ninhurs.description:
You worship [color=#20af20]Ninhurs, the Green Mother[/color]. 

As a new follower, you may call upon [color=#20af20]Ninhurs[/color] to heal you and cleanse you of [color=#70ff00]Sickness[/color] through recitation of the [color=#20af20]Leget Mhor[/color] [color=#ffff50]I[/color]. 

As your glory increases, [color=#20af20]Ninhurs[/color] will grant you the ability to deal high [color=#70ff00]Poison[/color] damage to nearby enemies through the [color=#20af20]Uttuk Alu[/color] [color=#ffff50]II[/color] and to summon divine serpents through the [color=#20af20]Loh Musma[/color] [color=#ffff50]III[/color].

[color=#20af20]Ninhurs[/color] rewards your presence on [color=#ffff50]divine grass[/color] with increased healing and the application of [color=#60af20]Entangle[/color] on enemies. As enemies die on [color=#ffff50]divine grass[/color], the [color=#20af20]Leget Mhor[/color] and [color=#20af20]Uttuk Alu[/color] will rapidly regain charges.

Mehtar.title: Mehtar
Mehtar.name: [color=#60b0ff]Mehtar[/color]
Mehtar.brief: The Goddess of ice and illusions. Rewards descent into her immaculate dream.
Mehtar.description_start:
[color=#ffff50]I[/color] [color=#60b0ff]Het Dorova[/color] [color=#a0a0a0]heals you and cleanses Freeze[/color]
[color=#ffff50]II[/color] [color=#60b0ff]Va Tyrana[/color] [color=#a0a0a0]applies Dream to yourself for each current Dream[/color]
[color=#ffff50]III[/color] [color=#60b0ff]Ra Muruga[/color] [color=#a0a0a0]deals Ice and Psychic damage in a large area[/color]
Mehtar.prayer:
O [color=#60b0ff]Mehtar[/color],

of the unmoving illusion,

who carries the mind,

on blue feathers...

bless this sleep!

Dumuzi.title: Dumuzi
Dumuzi.name: [color=#d09000]Dumuzi[/color]
Dumuzi.brief: The God of the golden tomb. Rewards the preservation of his sacred entourage and the accumulation of armor.
Dumuzi.description_start:
[color=#ffff50]I[/color] [color=#d09000]Senheb[/color] [color=#a0a0a0]heals you and cleanses Corrosion[/color]
[color=#ffff50]II[/color] [color=#d09000]Sedjhet[/color] [color=#a0a0a0]deals Death damage to nearby enemies and grants bonus Armor[/color]
[color=#ffff50]III[/color] [color=#d09000]Neter Ammah[/color] [color=#a0a0a0]summons a Gilded Dead[/color]
Dumuzi.prayer:
O [color=#d09000]Dumuzi[/color],

of the glittering mound,

no treasure escapes you,

your silent army,

with limbs of gold,

accept this offering!

Hadad.title: Hadad
Hadad.name: [color=#ff8000]Hadad[/color]
Hadad.brief: The God of wildfire and storms. Favors those who perform the dance of pure combat.
Hadad.description_start:
[color=#ffff50]I[/color] [color=#ff8000]Nesh Ti[/color] [color=#a0a0a0]heals you and cleanses Scorch[/color]
[color=#ffff50]II[/color] [color=#ff8000]Nesh Zatu[/color] [color=#a0a0a0]deals Lightning and Fire damage in a path to many enemies[/color]
[color=#ffff50]III[/color] [color=#ff8000]Nesh Girra[/color] [color=#a0a0a0]deals Lightning and Fire damage to adjacent enemies[/color]
Hadad.prayer:
O [color=#ff8000]Hadad[/color],

father of lightning,

of the twice-burned hand,

your destroying spirit,

your obliterating gaze,

honor me!
Hadad.description: You worship [color=#ff8000]Hadad, the Lord of Storms[/color]

Eresh.title: Eresh
Eresh.name: [color=#a0a000]Eresh[/color]
Eresh.brief: The Goddess of the wretched dead. Exults in the death of allies.
Eresh.description_start:
[color=#ffff50]I[/color] [color=#a0a000]Gibija[/color] [color=#a0a0a0]summons 5 Slouching Dead and cleanses Doom[/color]
[color=#ffff50]II[/color] [color=#a0a000]Sluga[/color] [color=#a0a0a0]summons one Slouching Dead[/color]
[color=#ffff50]III[/color] [color=#a0a000]Razaranja[/color] [color=#a0a0a0]deals Death damage to nearby units based on total allies[/color]
Eresh.prayer:
O [color=#a0a000]Eresh[/color],

of the consuming grave,

whose army slouches from the mire,

whose womb is decay itself,

of the breathless multitude,

of the muttering annihilation,

comfort me!
Eresh.description: You worship [color=#a0a000]Eresh, the Queen of the Dead[/color]

Dorok.title: Dorok
Dorok.name: [color=#cf6f40]Dorok[/color]
Dorok.brief: The God of stoic resolve and honorable combat. Rewards injury and perseverance.
Dorok.description_start:
[color=#ffff50]I[/color] [color=#cf6f40]Grim Contemplation[/color] [color=#a0a0a0]heals you and cleanses all Effects[/color]
[color=#ffff50]II[/color] [color=#cf6f40]Sober Punishment[/color] [color=#a0a0a0]deals Blunt damage in a path to an enemy based on your missing life[/color]
[color=#ffff50]III[/color] [color=#cf6f40]Rigid Violence[/color] [color=#a0a0a0]performs extra attacks against adjacent enemies[/color]
Dorok.prayer:
O [color=#cf6f40]Dorok[/color],

unmoving visage,

you do not listen,

I do not care,

strengthen me,

if you wish...
